name: marathon
description: A container orchestration platform for Mesos and DC/OS.
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of one node with at least 2 CPU shares and 1GB of RAM available for the Marathon DC/OS Service.
postInstallNotes:
Marathon DC/OS Service has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/ and https://mesosphere.github.io/marathon
	Issues: https://github.com/mesosphere/marathon/issues
postUninstallNotes:
The Marathon DC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/deploying-services/uninstall/ to clean up any persisted state
